sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUPPLEMENT, in literature, an appendage to ſupply what is wanting in a book. Books of various kinds require ſuch an appendage ; but none ſo much as a dictionary of arts and ſciences, which, from the progreſſive courſe of physical ſcience, cannot be completed without it.
